title: Strengthening Instructional Practice Competencies: Science Learning Design and Mental Health for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: University-level basic science knowledge and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mental health issue cases that may arise during science learning processes using learning design tools
Learners can propose learning design improvement strategies by applying a student case study (vignette)-based approach
Learners can integrate mental health support strategies suitable for blended environments into learning designs

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
